item.title: Re: Hunt the Sandfurry!
item.content:encoded: I've run into that mission too, though I don't understand quite why it's a 30d/8s version of the other missionâ€¦

item.title: Re: Hunt the Sandfurry!
item.content:encoded: That was me posting btw, forgot to log-in.

item.title: Hunt the Sandfurry!
item.content:encoded: Wiki says that the diff for this Wasteland mission is 22d/10s. While I did encounter this mission once (at 24d since I'm at Crank 2), I've been seeing more of the mission with 32d/?s. Forgot the number of successes, but it should be around 10-14. I wonder if it's a bug, or a different mission altogether, so I wanna know if someone else has encountered this mission.
